generation_guidelines.style_consistency: Maintain pixelated, blocky aesthetic throughout all images
generation_guidelines.lighting: Use warm, atmospheric lighting that enhances mood
generation_guidelines.composition: Focus on emotional impact and story progression
generation_guidelines.color_harmony: Maintain consistent color palette across all images
generation_guidelines.character_consistency: Keep character designs simple but expressive
